text: Axel Bamba (born 6 July 1999) is a professional footballer who plays as a defender for Paris FC. Born in Switzerland, Bamba opted to represent the Ivory Coast internationally. ==Professional career== Bamba joined the youth academy of Paris FC in 2010, and worked his way up to the senior team. He made his professional debut with Paris FC in a 0–0 (4–3) Coupe de la Ligue penalty shootout win over AC Ajaccio on 14 August 2018. ==International== Bamba was born in Switzerland, where his Ivorian father Yacouba Bamba was playing football for FC Zürich, and moved to France at the a young age. Despite interest from the French youth teams, Bamba declared he would represent the Ivory Coast national football team like his father. ==References== ==External links== * * Paris FC Profile * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Zürich Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Swiss footballers Category:Swiss people of Ivorian descent Category:Association football defenders Category:Paris FC players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Ivorian expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Swiss expatriate footballers Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Axel Bamba
